title: Anne-Marie Trevelyan – 2022 Comments on Boris Johnson Returning as Prime Minister
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Anne-Marie Trevelyan, the Conservative MP for Berwick-upon-Tweed, on Twitter on 21 October 2022.
content:
I have worked closely with ⁦Boris Johnson⁩ for many years. He can continue to deliver for the country and already has a mandate. It’s time to #bringbackboris.
